https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lsZ31hWNzAnWvcvrDy9Tn8cXWRO.jpg It is a real life drama film about a 13-year-old whose mother is about to die of cancer. The mother no longer believes in God and her daughter is desperately trying to convince her to change her mind before she passes away. A Flower from Heaven 2: A Perilous Journey
